title: (x) 2008 Design Sponge Scholarscript 50s style script - Feel Script {Trish}
content:
I’ve been wondering for some time which font this was. I’m not one usually for scripted type, but something about this has always attracted me. : D

comments.content: Thank you! I love this site, so much. Looks like veer will be getting a lil bit more of my money. :-D
